about_the_game:
You are one of the biggest contributors to the global environment

As a cloud, float and soar over the world letting loose rain, snow and hail upon all of those below your puffy embrace

Help the cavemen from the dangers of dehydration, excessive heat, droughts and other catastrophic eco-disasters



In Weather Dominance, you take on the role of a cloud with unique abilities to control the weather. Wind, raining, lightning, snow and hail are at your disposal as you embark on a journey to help cavemen and innocent animals in a mysterious world

As a cloud, you'll face both action-packed and puzzle-filled quests, each with its own set of challenges and rewards. In action quests, you'll use your natural abilities to create storms, manipulate the environment, and defeat enemies. In puzzle quests, you'll have to use your wits to navigate through intricate challenges, unlock secret areas, and help the cavemen and animals in need



As you progress through the game, you'll unlock new abilities and power-ups that will help you become an even more dominant force of nature, You'll need to strategize and think carefully about your next move to overcome obstacles and complete your missions
